features: Up To A VESA 200x200 Mounting Pattern - Universal Bracket
Ultra Low Profile Flush TV Wall Mount - 3/4" From Wall - One of industries lowest!
Fits LED & LCD TV's from 15" up to 42". Fits Plasma TV's from 15" up to 37"
Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount comes with a Load Capacity of 55lbs

body.description: The Ultra slim TV wall mount bracket from Southern Homewares fits most major brands and models available on the market. It offers a wide range of VESA compatible Models including most 15” to 42” models LED/LCD and most 15” to 37” Plasma models. Overall dimensions: 11.8 x 1.5 x 7 inches . It is ideal for use in the family room, den, bedroom, boardroom or waiting area. The universal TV bracket that fits LED, LCD and plasma screens mounts your appliance flush against the wall for a sleek look and space-saving design. vesa compatibility: 75x75mm, 100mm x 100mm, 100mm x 200mm, 200mm x 200mmcoating: durable powder coated finishconstruction: steelflush: ¾” from wall - one of industrial lowest!fits most LED/LCD: 15”, 18”, 21”, 24”, 26”, 32”, 37”, 40”, 42”fits most Plasma: 15”, 18”, 21”, 24”, 26”, 32”, 37”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low cost, high quality mount
reviews.reviewText: Stopped by a big box store as I looked for something similar but the price was three times as much. Decided to try this and I am completely satisfied. I used it to hang a 40” TV and I like that it is tight to the wall so it looks very sleek. I mounted it to a stud using the top and bottom center holes and it supporting the tv perfectly. All in all very satisfied and it was a quick 5 minute installation. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install. Great price.
reviews.reviewText: Needed something to put my second monitor in home office. Worked perfectly. Super easy to install and excellent price. This is a 19 inch monitor. Perfect. I bought a second for my other monitor. I enjoy the extra desk space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You won't find a better mount for the price, just make sure to measure everything before you buy.
reviews.reviewText: This mount is only about 12 inches wide. It's about the size of a license plate. If your studs are 16 inches apart it may not be for you.Unfortunately this mount did not work for me. But I'm still rating it at four stars because it does exactly what it was supposed to and the problem was my TV, not the mount. It was cheap, easy to assemble and a breeze to mount to my wall. The only reason it didn't work for me is because the back of my TV bulges out about an inch and a half on the bottom and because of this I could not attach the security screws to the bottom of the brackets. I wasn't comfortable leaving my TV on the wall without it being secured, so I took the mount down and went with another, FAR more expensive brand.If the back of your TV is flat, and it's inputs come out the bottom or the sides and not straight out the back, and you don't need the TV to tilt, this mount would be perfect for you. I may not have been able to use it but I'm saving it for the next TV I need to mount in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Read before installing
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised! Great price! Would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to mount a tv on a wall.FYI...My wife came home from work after I installed it and she wanted the tv an inch lower.I was about to get a divorce then I realized all I had to do was to change which hight bolt on the back of the tv.It slides left and right by inches so you have some margin of error and you can adjust the hight by moving the brackets on the back of the tv. So if you mount it and you want it higher or lower there is some give.Put the bolts in the middle of the tv so you can give your self an out if you want to go higher or lower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s Just okay
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t recommend for anything over 32 inches. I tried it for a my small 32inch and it’s fine but it’s not secure for my 42 inch. The anchors that come with it are no good. The screws did not grip them at all!!. This cheap little thing is to small to reach across studs. Please find something else if you need it for anything over 32 inches. You get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Not very fancy but it is a good product. The television sits very close to the wall and it is secure. I hung it with the included hardware but my television fell in the middle of the night. I replaced it with some heavy duty anchors and bigger set of screws and it had been secure ever since. The anchors they include with this is trash but the unit itself is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For $8.79, it is an awesome deal!
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount serves its purpose for what it's meant for at such an awesome price! It is made of a durable metal and have 100 % confidence in it holding my 32" TV, as long as it's drilled to a stud. The only downside is that you can only slide the TV brackets so far sideways to center it in the room. But the price greatly makes up for that, so 5 stars!!!
Came 2 days early and works amazing!

Soporte para pantallas muy ligeras, lo coloque para soportar una bravía kdl-40r480b y quedó muy presentable, la distancia entre muro y pantalla es muy poca y esto hace que los cables sean casi imperceptibles ademas viene con los aditamentos necesarios para adaptarse a las medidas de la pantalla es ligero y resistente, una observación antes de instalar es que se debe tener en cuenta lo que se va a conectar a la pantalla ya que modificar wsto mas adelante puede ser un poco laborioso
